original_text: “The king of the South will become strong, but one of his commanders will become even stronger than he and will rule his own kingdom with great power.
korean_text: 남방의 왕들은 강할 것이나 그 군주들 중 하나는 그보다 강하여 권세를 떨치리니 그의 권세가 심히 클 것이요

sentences.original_text: The king of the South will become strong
but one of his commanders will become even stronger than he
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 장군 중 한 사람은 그보다 더욱 강해질 것이다

sentences.original_text: and will rule his own kingdom with great power
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 큰 권능으로 자기 왕국을 다스릴 것이다
